name: Kanem
startIntroPart2: Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Get out of my way, hurry up!
attacked: Fine, this war shall last for centuries to come!
defeated: Alright, destroy Kanem, because i can always form a new kingdom anyway...
introduction: We have been focred to move to these fertile lands, we are Kanem..!
tradeRequest: Welcome, care for an exchange of things?
uniques: [+1 Gold, +3 Food] from [Lake] tiles [in all cities]

name: The Mapuche
startIntroPart2: Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: It comes to war. Mapuche shall use your own weapons against you!
attacked: I knew you could not be trusted! We have long prepared for this war. Have you?
defeated: We resisted to the last, but it was too late... too late.
introduction: I am Lautaro, the Swift Hawk. Mapuche honor me with respect. Will I see the same from you?
tradeRequest: Our crops are ripe this time around, would you like some?

name: The M훮ori
startIntroPart2: Can you build a civilisation that can stand the test of time?
attacked: Look at the big civ leader over there with the war declaration! Great job, mate. Really shows off how hard you are.
defeated: I have done my utmost, but your strength was greater. My heart, at least, will beat undefeated.
introduction: Kia Ora! You approach the land of Aotearoa, land of the M훮ori
tradeRequest: Here are gifts of pounamu, korowai cloaks and huhu grubs.
uniqueName: Land of the Long White Cloud
uniques: Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Ancient era]>

name: Bavaria
startIntroPart2: Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
